title: HPD: 2-year-old shot in abdomen in N. Houston
content:
HOUSTON – A 2-year-old is in critical condition after he was shot in the abdomen Monday night.
The boy was taken by Life Flight to Memorial Hermann Hospital and immediately taken into surgery, according to Lt. Larry Crowson with the Houston Police Department. The boy is expected to survive.
The shooting occurred at an apartment complex in the 16800 block of Ella Boulevard in north Houston around 8 p.m.
The boy was reportedly inside an apartment with multiple adults. Investigators are working to determine what led to the shooting and whether it was accidental.
Police said they haven’t recovered any weapons as of Monday night and they’re receiving conflicting statements with witnesses inside.
